db:abstract.db:para: The QGeoPositionInfo class contains information gathered on a global position, direction and velocity at a particular point in time.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A QGeoPositionInfo contains, at a minimum, a geographical coordinate and a timestamp. It may also have heading and speed measurements as well as estimates of the accuracy of the provided data.

db:section.db:title: enum QGeoPositionInfo::Attribute
db:section.db:para: Defines the attributes for positional information.

db:td.db:para: The bearing measured in degrees clockwise from true north to the direction of travel.

The angle between the horizontal component of the magnetic field and true north, in degrees. Also known as magnetic declination. A positive value indicates a clockwise direction from true north and a negative value indicates a counter-clockwise direction.
The accuracy of the provided latitude-longitude value, in meters.
The accuracy of the provided altitude value, in meters.

db:section.db:title: QGeoPositionInfo::QGeoPositionInfo()
db:section.db:para: Creates an invalid QGeoPositionInfo object.

db:section.db:title: QGeoPositionInfo::QGeoPositionInfo(const QGeoCoordinate &coordinate, const QDateTime &timestamp)
db:section.db:para: Creates a QGeoPositionInfo for the given coordinate and timestamp.

db:section.db:title: QGeoPositionInfo::QGeoPositionInfo(const QGeoPositionInfo &other)
db:section.db:para: Creates a QGeoPositionInfo with the values of other.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QGeoPositionInfo::~QGeoPositionInfo()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a QGeoPositionInfo object.

db:section.db:title: qreal QGeoPositionInfo::attribute(QGeoPositionInfo::Attribute attribute) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of the specified attribute as a qreal value.
Returns NaN if the value has not been set.
The function hasAttribute() should be used to determine whether or not a value has been set for an attribute.

db:section.db:title: QGeoCoordinate QGeoPositionInfo::coordinate() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the coordinate for this position.
Returns an invalid coordinate if no coordinate has been set.

db:section.db:title: bool QGeoPositionInfo::hasAttribute(QGeoPositionInfo::Attribute attribute) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the specified attribute is present for this QGeoPositionInfo object.

db:section.db:title: bool QGeoPositionInfo::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the timestamp() and coordinate() values are both valid.

db:section.db:title: void QGeoPositionInfo::removeAttribute(QGeoPositionInfo::Attribute attribute)
db:section.db:para: Removes the specified attribute and its value.

db:section.db:title: void QGeoPositionInfo::setAttribute(QGeoPositionInfo::Attribute attribute, qreal value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the value for attribute to value.

db:section.db:title: void QGeoPositionInfo::setCoordinate(const QGeoCoordinate &coordinate)
db:section.db:para: Sets the coordinate for this position to coordinate.

db:section.db:title: void QGeoPositionInfo::setTimestamp(const QDateTime &timestamp)
db:section.db:para: Sets the date and time at which this position was reported to timestamp.
The timestamp must be in UTC time.

db:section.db:title: QDateTime QGeoPositionInfo::timestamp() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the date and time at which this position was reported, in UTC time.
Returns an invalid QDateTime if no date/time value has been set.

db:section.db:title: bool QGeoPositionInfo::operator!=(const QGeoPositionInfo &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if any of this object's values are not the same as those of other.

db:section.db:title: QGeoPositionInfo &QGeoPositionInfo::operator=(const QGeoPositionInfo &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns the values from other to this QGeoPositionInfo.

db:section.db:title: bool QGeoPositionInfo::operator==(const QGeoPositionInfo &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if all of this object's values are the same as those of other.

db:section.db:title: QDataStream &operator<<(QDataStream &stream, QGeoPositionInfo::Attribute attr)
db:section.db:para: Writes the given attr enumeration to the specified stream.

db:section.db:title: QDataStream &operator<<(QDataStream &stream, const QGeoPositionInfo &info)
db:section.db:para: Writes the given info to the specified stream.

db:section.db:title: QDataStream &operator>>(QDataStream &stream, QGeoPositionInfo &info)
db:section.db:para: Reads a coordinate from the specified stream into the given info.

db:section.db:title: QDataStream &operator>>(QDataStream &stream, QGeoPositionInfo::Attribute &attr)
db:section.db:para: Reads an attribute enumeration from the specified stream info the given attr.
